classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: This means no more re-typing the password as you would normally do on the command line.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着不需要像平時一樣在命令行上重複輸入密碼。

sentences.english: Run it again every time you open a new command-line window.
sentences.chinese: 每次打開新的命令行窗口時都要重新運行它。

sentences.english: These two methods provide the ability to apply fixpacks using the command line interface.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個方法提供了通過命令行接口應用補丁包的能力。

sentences.english: We'll use a password file command-line option in the script.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在腳本中使用一個密碼文件命令行選項。

sentences.english: The command line options will override the choices made in the GUI.
sentences.chinese: 這些命令行選項將會蓋掉您原來在圖形介面下的選項。

sentences.english: Rails makes extensive use of command line scripts.
sentences.chinese: Rails大量使用了命令行腳本。

sentences.english: Configuration of NdisWrapper is command line intensive.
sentences.chinese: 的配置是增強型命令行。

sentences.english: Now open this file with whichever command line editor you're most comfortable with.
sentences.chinese: 現在用一款你用着最順手的命令行編輯器打開此文件。

sentences.english: Some of the programs in the tutorial require command-line arguments to run.
sentences.chinese: 教程中的一些程序需要命令行參數才能運行。

sentences.english: You can also use the command line to find out the size for a particular file format.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以使用此命令行來找到某特定文件格式的大小。

sentences.english: Consider the basic problem of writing a command-line script for performance monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 設想一個編寫命令行腳本進行性能監控的簡單問題。

sentences.english: This section explains how to automate resource management using command line scripts.
sentences.chinese: 本節解釋如何使用命令行腳本自動化資源管理。

sentences.english: They included a command-line interpreter and some small utility programs.
sentences.chinese: 還包括一個命令行解釋器和一些小的實用程序。

sentences.english: We are also planning to include command line tool and MsBuild task.
sentences.chinese: 我們也打算包含命令行工具和MsBuild任務。

sentences.english: List of user-specified command line parameters.
sentences.chinese: 用戶指定的命令行參數的列表。
